Reviews.Title: Not much life in them.
Reviews.Author: Betty J. Karl
Reviews.Content: These batteries do not hold a charge and whatever charge is left when you go to use them dissipates VERY quickly.  They may be good in an emergency for the last couple shots of the day.  Don't depend on them for a full day's shooting.  I bought these to get the 12 volt charger and figured I'd need extra batteries also.  I guess I've wasted at least $20 and now I'll have to buy a REAL Pansonic battery that will hold up to a full shooting day.  Not at all pleased with these.

Reviews.Title: batteries dont hold a charge
Reviews.Author: A nerd
Reviews.Content: These batteries work great (if you use them right away.)They passively discharge very quickly. (aka when they are fully charged, and sit for extended periods of time without being in a device aka camera)Charged both batteries on November 16, went to use them on November 28 and they were at 25% charge, I had time to charge one when i realized that both of them were the same,When fully charged, and used quickly, they have adequate power(i got around 200 shots with flash)

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLC12 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix FZ200 Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLC12
